refnamediv.refpurpose: An LED bound to an epics channel.

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: All options recognized by the led widget are recognized by this widget. In addition, the required option: -channel epicsPV provides the name of the epics process variable to bind to the LED. The LED will be 'on' if the process variable is nonzero or any textual value that tcl recognizes as boolean, or 'off' if not.

refsect1.title: METHODS
refsect1.para: All methods recognized by the led widget are supported, however it is recommended that you not call on or off.

refsect1.title: KNOWN ISSUES
refsect1.para: If the on or off colors are changed, this is not reflected until the channel next changes value.
